Title: Game of Thrones
Actors: Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington
Plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

Title: Bigil
Plot: Michael gives up his dream of becoming a footballer after his father's murder. However, a friend convinces him to coach a women's football team and turn his life around.

Title: Mirzapur

Plot: A shocking incident at a wedding procession ignites a series of events entangling the lives of two families in the lawless city of Mirzapur.
